price: Kí ló mu yín tí ẹ kò páyà títóbi Allāhu?
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
